articles.title: 'The Last of Us' and 'Wii Sports' join the World Video Game Hall of Fame | Engadget
articles.description: This year's World Video Game Hall of Fame inductees were selected ahead of other finalists such as Angry Birds, Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare, FIFA International Soccer and Goldeneye 007..
articles.content:
The Strong National Museum of Play has revealed

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Video Game Hall of Fame 2023 adds The Last of Us, Wii Sports and Barbie
articles.description: The World Video Game Hall of Fame at The Strong National Museum of Play adds four new games to the class in 2023: Barbie Fashion Designer, Computer Space, The Last of Us, and Wii Sports.
articles.content: Four inductees joined the World Video Game Hall of Fame at the Strong National Museum of Play, organizers announced Thursday: Barbie Fashion Designer, Computer Space, The Last of Us, and Wii Sports. … [+2806 chars]
